Message: use function expressions in suite and test blocks
Description: When writing Mocha tests, the blocks should be function expressions instead of lambdas.  The reasoning is that it's easier to refactor if a test needs a custom timeout, or needs to be conditionally skipped: it('should do x', () => {   this.skip(); // throws exception });  it('should do x', function () {   this.skip(); // ok });
